customtext.default_successful: Custom warning text has been restored to the original text.
customtext.invalid_reset: Custom Warning Text has **already** been reset.
customtext.change_successful: Custom warning text has been changed to {var}

customprob.less_than_50: You can't set the NSFW sensitivity lower than 50 percent.
customprob.more_than_90: You can't set the NSFW sensitivity more than 90 percent.
customprob.change_successful: Custom NSFW sensitivity has been changed to **{var}%**
customprob.invalid_number: The number you input is already existed.

punishment.default_successful: Server Punishment has been reset to Default.
punishment.change_successful: Server Punishment has been set to: [Action: {var1}] - [Limit (per-message): ${var2}]

faq.title: Popular Questions:
faq.faq1_a: Check the bot permissions/channels. Don't do it on channel filtered with NSFW options.
faq.faq2_q: The bot was not detect it.
faq.faq2_a: We work to improve the bot every day! Or might be our server is down. [Join our support server for more information.](https://discord.gg/dkP9fwY)
faq.faq3_q: Can the log channel filtered with NSFW?
faq.faq4_q: How I can set the moderation logs?

help.embed_description: Type **{prefix}help [command] / @mention help [command]** to get more specific information about a command.

log.invalid_reset: `There's no channel need to be removed.
log.change_successful: {var} will be used to post an action from members such as posting NSFW.

prefix.invalid_reset: The Server Prefix is already default.

nsfwsession.cooldown: Calm down. You need to wait **{var}** seconds to use the command again.

description.customtext: Change custom warning text such as **Don't post NSFW here.**
description.help: Show a command list from Anti-NSFW bot.
description.log: Display a mod-log in an existing channel when user post NSFW.
